title: Morehouse School of Medicine - MSM
description: Morehouse School of Medicine (MSM) trains physicians, biomedical scientists and public health practitioners to improve the health and well-being of people of color and the underserved urban and rural populations in Georgia and the nation.
cleaned_text: COVID-19 Advisory: If you think you've been exposed to coronavirus (COVID-19), please call the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention at [1-800-232-4636](tel:18002324636) for further guidance. Monkeypox Advisory: If you think you have been exposed to monkeypox or have symptoms, please call the Georgia Department of Public Health at [1-866-782-4854](tel:18667824854) for further guidance.
